question_content.description:
### Problem17
What does an instance variable refer to in an instance method?

**Choices:**

A. A value in the scope of the constructor associated with the method

B. A value in the scope of the method

C. A value associated with the object that was used to invoke the method

D. A value in the scope of the method's client

E. An object that was created by the constructor associated with the method

 _Excerpt from the Coursera Site._
question_content.author: Yantao Mei
choices: A. A value in the scope of the constructor associated with the method
B. A value in the scope of the method
C. A value associated with the object that was used to invoke the method
D. A value in the scope of the method's client
E. An object that was created by the constructor associated with the method
